Articles.Content:
Hello fellow KSP players! I don't know about you, but I have always wanted to just have a standalone nuclear reactor. So, I figured, why not make one?

I now present to you the Simple Nuclear Reactor. It uses the <abbr title="In-Situ Resource Utilization">ISRU</abbr> converter's model and texture, so it should have a minimal RAM effect (I don't know how this works)

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/hDPOp)

Download:

*[removed link to defunct website]*

Under MIT license
Yeah, pretty much. Even though ISP Electronics denies it.
I'd recommend you either add a license or state the mod as "Do as you like" or the moderators will give you an infraction.
Hey, I see you're redistributing squad assets, is that okay? have you run into any trouble? Thanks!
